content.text:
Look at the following description corresponding the the relavant image(s), Then answer a question

***Start of description***

The image depicts a close-up view of a flower with petals in various shades of purple. The petals exhibit different tints, shades, and intensities of the same color, ranging from light lavender to deep violet. The center of the flower has some green elements, but the overall focus is on the purple hues of the petals.

***End of description***
Now, answer the question:

Which color scheme involves the use of different tints, shades, and intensities of ONE color?<image 1>

A. Analogous Color Scheme
B. Complementary Color Scheme
C. Monochromatic Color Scheme
D. Triadic Color Scheme
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
